hackathon-description-text: This April, Northern Virginia Community College will be hosting its very own hackathon event, inNOVAtion! This 36 hour period will be filled with tech talks, programming, cyber security practice, food, fun and cutting edge creation. The focus of this event will be on secure coding to advocate for a more secure cyberspace and showcase the importance of cybersecurity to organizations, companies, and everyone else. Do not be intimidated, there are talks and challenges for every level of skill from beginner to advanced. This is a great opportunity to gain experience and learn about the booming computer science and information technology industries. Learn from working together with knowledgable individuals, hands-on experience, and promoting cybersecurity through secure coding.
hackathon-eligibility: You must be of age of 18 or older.
hackathon-requirements: You must have completed the challenge.
hackathon-rules: Absolutly no cheating during the event. No coping of other groups code. The companies will determine who gets the prizes.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=S College Dr, Woodbridge, VA 22191, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How unique is the app compared to other apps similar to it.
Is the design appealing and well coordinated
Do all of the functions of the app work correctly (methods, buttons, text-boxes etc).
Is the application user friendly and easy to navigate through.

hackathon-location-address: S College Dr, Woodbridge, VA 22191, USA
